title: Readout of the President's Call with Chancellor Merkel of Germany | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 07, 2011

 



Readout of the President's Call with Chancellor Merkel of Germany




The President and German Chancellor Angela Merkel spoke by phone this afternoon, continuing their ongoing consultations on the financial situation in the eurozone.Â  As before, the President expressed his appreciation for the efforts the Chancellor and other European leaders are making to resolve the crisis. Both leaders agreed on the importance of a lasting and credible solution to the crisis, and agreed continue their close cooperation on these issues.
